title: Here are the first MLB games coming to Apple TV+ starting next month
content:
Now that the MLB and its players have resolved their lockout dispute and Opening Day has been set, Apple has announced the first games that will be available on Apple TV+. This marks Apple’s first foray into live sports, and its new Friday Night Baseball programming will officially kick off on April 8.

more…
